ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides number-theoretic functions for factorization, prime  numbers, twin primes, primitive roots, modular logarithm and inverses, extended GCD, Farey series and continuous fractions. Includes Legendre and Jacobi symbols, some divisor functions, Euler's Phi function, etc.

Provides number-theoretic functions for factorization, prime  numbers, twin primes, primitive roots, modular logarithm and inverses, extended GCD, Farey series and continuous fractions. Includes Legendre and Jacobi symbols, some divisor functions, Euler's Phi function, etc.

name: r-numbers
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9-2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-numbers
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/numbers_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/numbers/numbers_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 01e3150612a16eae2747f141f31f9edcae9f9f5df0136a209bf0cd866f5affcd

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('numbers')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('numbers')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=numbers
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: " Provides number-theoretic functions for factorization, prime  numbers, twin primes, primitive roots, modular logarithm and inverses, extended GCD, Farey series and continuous fractions. Includes Legendre and Jacobi symbols, some divisor functions, Euler's Phi function, etc."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: numbers
# Type: Package
# Title: Number-Theoretic Functions
# Version: 0.7-1
# Date: 2018-05-16
# Author: Hans Werner Borchers
# Maintainer: Hans W. Borchers <hwborchers@googlemail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.0)
# Suggests: gmp (>= 0.5-1)
# Description:  Provides number-theoretic functions for factorization, prime  numbers, twin primes, primitive roots, modular logarithm and inverses, extended GCD, Farey series and continuous fractions. Includes Legendre and Jacobi symbols, some divisor functions, Euler's Phi function, etc.
# License: GPL (>= 3)
